comments:
Build: 3.0 M8

While trying out the new tracing tab in the runtime workbench launch 
configuration, we ran into an NPE upon creating a new launch configuration.

Looking at the stack, it seems that, for some reason, the dispose() method is 
being called on the tab group before the createControl() method gets called on 
the individual tabs.  This is very unusual.

This causes the NPE in the PDE code because member variables that are 
initialized in the createControl() method are still null when dispose() is 
being called.

For now, we added null checks in the dispose() method of the tab, but it would 
be interesting to see why dispose() is called prematurely on the tab group.

I believe this is API(part of the spec, that has always been). A tab can be created without calling it's "create control" method. A tab group can be created to initialize a config with default values, and then diposed without ever creating the widgets. - create tab group (& tabs) - setDefaults(...) - dispose From the javadoc: * * The method setDefaults(ILaunchConfigurationWorkingCopy) * can be called before a tab's controls are created. *
